channel.title: Website of Jane Doe
channel.description: Recent content on Website of Jane Doe

item.title: GameJam License
item.description: Today’s subject is a very human story, but the details of it might be a little dry.

item.title: Metal shading language compiler
item.description: Background When I first met Johan, and he initially hired me to work on Fugl, before I became a partner on the game, he had the initial version running on iOS using Metal and MSL.

item.title: Journodevswap
item.description: I recently volunteered as a judge for the JourneyDevSwap game jam at UKIE HQ in central London.

item.title: Code Notes
item.description: This is my page of miscellaneous notes, mostly relating to code — a list of open source c++ compatible libraries, blog roll, and so forth.

item.title: Profile
item.description: Senior Video Game Programmer I am an experienced senior graphics, audio & game engine programmer, with a swiss army knife certificate in cross-platform and experimental game development.

item.title: Games
item.description: table#t01,td#t01,tr#t01 { width: 100%; } I have worked on 17 different commercial games, since I started working in the video games industry in 2004.

item.title: Academic Record
item.description: I am currently a late-in-life PhD student at Goldsmiths, University of London, as part of the IGGI PhD Program.
